course.subject: LANG
course.name: Academic Writing in Context - Global China Studies
course.description: This is a course with a special delivery mode -- a combination of input sessions plus highly individualized assistance provided for students to address their specific writing needs, dictated by students' choices of topics in particular areas of Global China Studies. For GCS students only.
course.corequisites: SHSS 4991 OR SHSS 4992

reviews.author: alexchw
reviews.title: 人格分裂+黑人問號
reviews.comment_content:
其實一個學期只有兩個課節，他能夠說的事情有限，但基本上是什麼都沒有學到。
consultation section其實很矛盾，他的意見和advisor完全不同，結果一份paper既要取悅他，又要取悅advisor，大家要小心這個情況。我就做到人格分裂，advisor說我做得好，他就不斷的在叫我改，基本上和原先的paper是兩回事。
reviews.comment_teaching: 和大部分LANG course相似，就係悶
reviews.comment_grading:
40%係draft
60%係final product
給分沒有透明度，直接就出grade，而且跟了他的要求去改文，出來的效果還是不好，幸好只是1-cre，否則一定被他拖後腿！
reviews.comment_workload: 當然很重，基本上他的要求和advisor的要求是相違背的。

reviews.author: 快樂肥仔
reviews.comment_content: Not important at all, you have learnt all (most) of the useful skills in other language courses, so the lecture is not very meaningful.
reviews.comment_teaching: Sometimes the comments given by the tutor were contradictory to the advice given by the capstone supervisor, and I don't think the tutor was well-prepared for the consultation, so this course is not useful for me.
reviews.comment_grading: I got an A range for my capstone project in SHSS 4991, but I got a B- in this course.
reviews.comment_workload: the workload of SHSS 4991 and LANG 4070 is almost the same

reviews.author: chimz
reviews.comment_content: This is a co-requisite course, aiming for English proficiency in writing research paper (or in specific GCS Capstone project). Our session is co-facilitated by Dr Po-lung Li. Only 2 lectures in the whole semester and TWO 30-minutes consultation periods. Within these two lectures, instructors will tell you what you have to write exactly. For two consultation periods, the instructors will go through your product (incl. interim report at week 7 and final report at week 13) one by one. They will offer you some grammar advice and also touch on something about coherence and cohesion. I believe that their opinions and experiences really help me out when your capstone supervisor is an English-speaking professor / lecturer. When you meet these people, their help is really important to brush up your paper. For all Humanities and Social Science students, you have to know good English is quite important for delivering concrete and accurate ideas. Therefore, please do pay attention in class and raise any questions if you have any doubts when you are writing your paper. Both lang instructors definitely will help you out.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Shaun is definitely the best lang instructor i have met at HKUST. He marked my product thoroughly and suggested some concrete ideas for me to follow up. Here are two samples. All words in bracket are suggested by Shaun.

1. about grammar
sub-section X elaborates the function of something that (to) opens up a virtual ground for people presenting(<--to present; this is a recurring error; make sure the correct structure is “…for someone to do something…”) their ideas

2. about organisation
The assumption notes that this topic [<--why isn’t this put together with the place where it is first brought up?]...

I think Shaun is fabulous. I have no doubt that he had delivered his concerns and expectations clearly. I particularly recommend people joining his classes or his iLang 1-on-1 consultation sessions.
reviews.comment_grading:
he had stated how many points (in 7-point scale on Content, Organisation, Referencing and Language) did you get in the first draft of the final product.

i think the grading is fair. My first draft is 5/4/4/5.5, and my final grade is B+. I think that is absolutely fair.
reviews.comment_workload: No separate workload for this course. This is a parallel session to capstone project. Basically, you are going to hand in the same product (interim report+ final report) as what you have submitted in SHSS4991

reviews.author: makaze
reviews.title: 【避鬼勸世文】毫無意義的存在 懷疑人生的lang course （請大家預留quota比呢個爛grade）

同學們，你試想過fyp同fyp lang會差好多個grade嗎？
同學們，你試過上一堂靈魂出竅的堂嗎？
同學們，你試過明明覺得自己英文都ok但結果被踩在地上摩擦嗎？死左都唔知咩事。。。。

come on welcome to 4070!!!!!!

reviews.comment_teaching:
呵呵

順帶一提 就是一如既往M小姐的套路
一直吹奏你一直鼓勵你 讓你以為自己follow她就沒問題了
裝出很supportive的樣子
到最後緊要關頭你要找她約consult求救
就byebye了開心放假 你們自生自滅吧
reviews.comment_grading:
30% first draft
70% final draft
評分準則純屬笑話，only看其中2份draft，但fyp中間改來改去是必然，draft又怎麽能反映fyp的quality？interesting
然而沒什麽公平可言
評分沒有透明度的，你不會知道自己死在哪裏
而且你要是聽取了意見改了很多，也不會看到你的努力的
況且lang tutor想要的和你fyp professor想要的通常也不一樣，所以你預左爛呢1cred啦

最後grade反映出什麽？你的努力只是徒勞
反映出大家的智商都在這一刻崩塌
不要難過 你要相信這rubbish grade不代表什麽 。。。（也就只能如此安慰大家了
如果不是1 cred的話，可能需要蘑菇見了。。。

或許大學生涯總是要受些磨練吧，像極了人生。
reviews.comment_workload:
也就那樣 主要還是fyp的workload大 而不是這個lang的workload
但至少fyp跟努力成正比
呢個就 一笑置之
